title: 服务器各种问题
author: shenyichen
txt_content: 服务器开出来后只有自己能进，朋友找不到。服务器开完后还不停有警告，自己却在服务器里玩！file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/799824599/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/_UTIX3T9T(0F8DA9X_%0CNY.jpg

replies.author: shenyichen
replies.txt_content: 出现Can‘t keep up！ Did the system time change，or is the server over loaded？

replies.author: SNIPER722
replies.txt_content:
1.换一台好一点的电脑 （理论上是内存不够用）
2.做好路由端口映射（实在懒用 hamachi）
